Dear IA-Team,

as requested in [HER-1103] I want/need an easy way to retrie=
ve HTTP
headers from WARC records (similar to how its done for ARC records)=
.

I've allready spent some time with this issue and now need some
feedback=
  to decide upon a "clean" solution (as I wouldn't consider my
current solu=
tion "final" yet).

Here is my current approach, feel free to add comments:=

 - I basically moved all of the HTTP-Header parsing code from
ARCReader in=
to ArchiveReader (this includes modifing read() to handle
the presence of a=
 httpHeaderStream like it was done in ARCReader)
 - extend ArchiveReader wi=
th abstract method
recordContainsParsableHeader() which I basically use to =
make sure I
don't try to parse http headers when there are none
 - change g=
etContentBegin to behave for WARC response records like it
does for ARC rec=
ords (it points after the http headers but before the
http payload)

Any id=
eas/thoughts are welcome. 
If the IA-Team dislikes such heavy modifications=
 of the current
readers/records I could also just write my own
HttpHeaderPa=
rsingWARCReader... But I think extending the allready
existant code would b=
e a better approach.

Regards
  Olaf Freyer
